metadata.Title: CVE-2021-35472 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in LemonLDAP::NG before 2.0.12. Session cachecorruption can lead to authorization bypass or spoofing. By running a loopthat makes many authentication attempts, an attacker might alternately beauthenticated as one of two different users.

criterions.comment: lemonldap-ng: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
